# NOTE: The Fine-Tuning Scheduler (FTS) examples will likely work with higher dependency versions than the ones
#   below. These ceilings reflect the highest package versions with which the FTS examples have been tested.
datasets<=2.8.0
evaluate<=0.4.0
transformers>=4.18.0, <=4.25.1
scikit-learn<=1.2.0
sentencepiece<=0.1.97
